column4: Hi!! Q = when i click on any GUI item in ubuntu linux, is there a way to see what commands bash runs side by side ?
Rephrasing my Q --> How to see what Bash commands run when I click on any GUI menu .. lets say like Calculator
I think you'd have to run the command from console?
.. erm .. calculator is just an example .. i want to keep a terminal running and see what commands run there when I click any icon
